channel.title: Comments on: The Bavinck Review 4 (2013)
channel.description: Promoting Reformed catholic scholarship in the tradition of Herman and J. H. Bavinck

item.title: By: Steven Woonhyun Yun
item.dc:creator: Steven Woonhyun Yun
item.content:encoded:
I am pastor in Korea.
My Th. M. Thesis is Trinitarian Sanctification by Herman Bavinck(Korean)
I want to see “The Bavinck Reviews”
